thing0.title: Draggable
thing0.description: Thing0s are draggable. Click and drag them to change the node they're anchored to.

thing0.title: Nodes
thing0.description: The nodes - blue circles - can be moved as well

thing0.title: Cycle Nodes
thing0.description: click on a node to rotate its thing0s. Hold shift to rotate anti-clockwise.

thing0.title: This is a thing0
thing0.description: This is this thing0's description. This thing0 tells you what it is. This is a terrible description
